Good morning Prof. Goodwin
  I am testing the premixed flame example with python interface
(flame2.py) but I get a "segmentation fault" error at the following
instruction:

f.setTimeStep(1.0e-5, [1, 2, 5, 10, 20])

If I comment out this line I get the solution w/o any problem. I have
checked the python documentation, the syntax seems to be correct.
I am running on a Linux machine, FC4, python 2.4.1.
Any idea?
Thanks
